title: Unable to change E-Mail\Password: Keeps saying I'm using the wrong password, even if I'm logged in.

replies.body: If you're using Chrome, you may have an old autofill causing this or something else.  Try [clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), running incognito, or another browser entirely to rule out possibilities.  Make sure you're also signed into the intended account and region.  Hope that helps!
